> The regression below predicts the weight (in Kg) of Kalahari !Kung San people from their heights (in cm). 

> How would you interpret the intercept coefficient of this model?

```{r}
fit <- lm(weight ~ height, data = howell)
summary(fit)
```

A) It indicates the average height in the sample
B) It indicates the lowest observed height in the sample
C) It indicates the predicted height for a weight of zero
D) It indicates the predicted weight for a height of zero
